meaning list.sentence: He refuses to learn how to use a smartphone; you can’t teach an old dog new tricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ስማርትፎን እንዴት መጠቀም እንደሚቻል ለመማር ፈቃደኛ አይሆንም; የድሮ ልማዶችን ለመለወጥ አስቸጋሪ ነው.

word: your guess is as good as mine

meaning list.sentence: Why the train is late? Your guess is as good as mine.
